3.0 20040611:00:10

I'm having a real problem editing this particular java file. I'll attach it.
Basically when I try and add unimplemented methods on the inner presentation
class the whole java file gets corrupted, or in some other sense the SWT display
is broken really badly. Next, while editing the whole editor dies. My log is
filled with this exception:

Note, I have all default java settings. This is a clean install and I was trying
to write an RCP application.

Ok, it seems that doing other things in the file also causes this. Removing
method end brackets. Also the log has several of the other following exceptions:
